name: Panamera 4
description: The Porsche Panamera 4 is a versatile luxury sports car that also functions well as a family vehicle. It offers a spacious interior with comfortable seating for four, ample legroom, and a sizable trunk.

name: Panamera Turbo E-Hybrid
description: The Panamera Turbo is a high-performance luxury sedan offering a blend of luxury, comfort, and impressive speed. It features a powerful engine and advanced technology for a thrilling driving experience.

name: Macan S
description: The Macan is a compact luxury crossover SUV known for its sporty handling and upscale interior. It offers a balance of practicality and performance, making it a popular choice among luxury SUV enthusiasts.

name: Macan
description: The Macan S is a variant of the Macan lineup, offering enhanced performance and additional features compared to the base model. It delivers a higher level of power and agility while maintaining the luxurious feel of the Macan.

name: Cayenne S
description: The Cayenne S is a mid-range variant of Porsche's flagship SUV, the Cayenne. It combines powerful performance with spaciousness and versatility, making it suitable for both daily driving and spirited adventures.

name: Cayenne Coupé
description: The Cayenne Coupé is a sleek and stylish variant of the Cayenne SUV, featuring a coupe-like roofline for a sportier appearance. It offers similar performance and features to the standard Cayenne but with a more dynamic design.
